rows: An arbitrary name of the Creatio to deploy. For example, "DevEnv."
Please enter site port, Max value - 65535:(recommended range between 40000 and 40100)
Port to access deployed Creatio website. For example, "40015."
html:
Parameter

Description

Please enter site name

An arbitrary name of the Creatio to deploy. For example, "DevEnv."

Please enter site port, Max value - 65535:
(recommended range between 40000 and 40100)

Port to access deployed Creatio website. For example, "40015."
